articles.title: Scientists determined the atomic structure of a coronavirus protein - Tech Explorist
articles.description: Using X-ray crystallography, scientists built an atomic model of ORF8, and it highlighted two unique regions: one that is only present in SARS-CoV-2 and its immediate bat ancestor, and one that is absent from any other coronavirus.
articles.content:
The molecular basis for the severity and rapid spread of the COVID-19 disease caused by SARS-CoV-2 is mostly unknown.
To do so, a team of HIV researchers, cellular biologists, and biophysicists coll… [+4573 chars]
